content: Hi all, the dev conference is still alive. New date and venue have been identified: March 30-31, 2017 in New Orleans. Cost target is $175. Please let me know if you know of conflicts with this date or location. We're getting close to making an official announcement. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1P9zQfBSwGacdgdY17GmxEyk-JY_q0_3tao04I9ca-Gg/edit#
